metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12938 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: UnRAR before 5.5.7 allows remote attackers to bypass a directory-traversalprotection mechanism via vectors involving a symlink to the . directory, asymlink to the .. directory, and a regular file.

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
